pages.index: DreamScore - Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Companion Home About us App Download Welcome to DreamScore Experience the ultimate fantasy cricket adventure and dominate the leaderboard! Join leagues, create your dream team, and compete with players from around the world. Track live scores, analyze player performance, and make strategic decisions to climb to the top. Get ready for a thrilling and immersive cricket experience like never before! Join Now Welcome to DreamScore, the ultimate destination for fantasy cricket enthusiasts. Our platform allows you to create your dream team, join exciting leagues, and compete with players from around the world. With real-time score tracking, player performance analysis, and strategic decision-making tools, DreamScore offers an immersive cricket experience like no other. Our mission is to provide a thrilling and interactive platform for cricket lovers to showcase their knowledge and skills. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to fantasy cricket, DreamScore offers a user-friendly interface and a community of passionate fans. Join us today and become a part of the DreamScore family! Build Your Team Users can create their own team with their favorite players and participate in various matches to showcase their strategic skills. Customize your lineup, select the best players, and lead your team to victory! Play with Friends Connect with friends and play together in friendly matches and exciting tournaments. Invite your friends, form alliances, and compete as a team. Experience the thrill of playing with your friends and make unforgettable memories. Join Tournaments Compete in various tournaments, challenge players from around the world, and win prestigious prizes. Test your skills against the best, climb the leaderboard, and earn your place as a top competitor in the fantasy sports arena. What is Fantasy Cricket? Fantasy cricket is a virtual game where participants create their own teams of real cricket players and earn points based on their performances in actual matches. How do I join a tournament? To join a tournament, you need to register on the platform, select a tournament, and create your team by selecting players within the given budget. Can I play with my friends? Yes, you can invite your friends to join the same tournament and compete against them. You can also create private leagues for your friends. How are points calculated? Points are calculated based on the real-life performance of the players in the actual cricket matches. Different actions like runs, wickets, catches, etc., earn different points. Is there a fee to join? Some tournaments are free to join, while others may have an entry fee. The details will be mentioned on the tournament page. What can I win? Prizes vary by tournament and can include cash prizes, gift vouchers, merchandise, and more. Check the tournament details for specific prize information. How do I withdraw my winnings? You can withdraw your winnings through the payment methods available on the platform, such as bank transfer, PayPal, or other digital wallets. Is my information secure? Yes, we take the security of your personal information seriously. Our platform uses advanced security measures to protect your data. Download the app By reaching out, you agree to our Privacy Policy. Download DreamScore Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Data Protection and Your Rights | DreamScore Fantasy Cricket Mobile App Home About us App Download Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to DreamScore, the ultimate fantasy cricket mobile app. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our mobile application. Information We Collect We collect various types of information when you interact with DreamScore, including personal information provided voluntarily by you and information automatically collected when you use our services. Use of Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. Sharing of Information We may share your information with third-party service providers that assist us in delivering our services, and as required by law or to protect our rights. Security of Your Information We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and maintain data accuracy, but no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us. DreamScore Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
